item.description:
From the website: The East Coast's Most Comprehensive Event for Electronics Engineers and Designers. Explore the latest developments in engineering, build knowledge and new skills, network with peers and technical experts, discover cutting-edge products & technologies, and find solutions to your biggest design challenges.
http://east.ubmdesign.com/

I believe theÂ EXPO (Tuesday and Wednesday) is free of charge, there are a series of sessions, tutorials and keynotes that are NOT free through out the week.
item.name: Design East Expo
